Articles.Content:
Unsure if this is the appropriate place to ask, but I've recently started a new playthrough of RP-1 with the (new to me) Programs and LCs update. After designing and building a small jet plane, I have been unable to simulate using it, as no pilot sits in the cockpit, I have hired a pilot however, and I am not sure where I went wrong!

TIA

*Been fixed, seems that the cockpit I was using couldn't be piloted for some reason, switching to Bonanza cabin fixed it

Edited February 28 by Grreenie
nvm fixed lel
